name: zig-wasm-webgl
description: An example demonstrating Zig interacting with a canvas via JS. It is a port of one of the official mozilla examples.

scripts.build: rm -rf *.wasm.o && rm -rf *.wasm && rm -rf dist/* && zig build-exe -target wasm32-freestanding main.zig && mkdir -p dist && mv main.wasm dist/ && rm -rf *.wasm.o
